original_text: Were not the Ethiopians and the Lubims a huge host, with very many chariots and horsemen? yet, because thou didst rely on the Lord, he delivered them into thine hand.
korean_text: 구스 사람과 룹 사람의 군대가 크지 아니하며 말과 병거가 심히 많지 아니하더이까 그러나 왕이 여호와를 의지하였으므로 여호와께서 왕의 손에 넘기셨나이다

sentences.original_text: Were not the Ethiopians and the Lubims a huge host
sentences.korean_translation: 에티오피아인과 룹 사람들이 큰 군대가 아니었더냐

sentences.original_text: with very many chariots and horsemen?
sentences.korean_translation: 매우 많은 전차와 기병을 가지고 있었더냐?

sentences.original_text: yet, because thou didst rely on the Lord
he delivered them into thine hand.
